title: Merlo e-WORKER ADVs
description: Some edits i made from raw material provided by Blank Spaces Digital Agency for Merlo e-WORKER social media reels. The edits focus on dynamic cuts and engaging visuals to capture the essence of the brand. All rights reserved to Merlo and Blank Spaces Digital Agency.
challenge: Create engaging and refined adv social media reels.
solution: Simple but effective cuts, text tracking to highlight key features of the product and color grading to enhance the overall look.
